content: I know the IG is in flight...
But what should the system be for problem category? http://argonautwiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Problems_and_Health_Concerns lists or references 3 different systems

http://argonaut.hl7.org, http://argonaut.hl7.org/extension-codes, and http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-category

the hl7.org/fhir one makes sense for the ones defined by FHIR already
The unqualified one seems like that wouldn't make sense, are we stuffing all extension values in there?

But the newer, draft IG seems to also reference the unqualified system. EG: http://ig.fhir.me/Healthedata1/Argo-DSTU2/structuredefinition-argo-careteam.html (the required pattern on the category field)
though really, both systems are pretty "unqualified" - one just lumps it under all of argonaut, the other just lumps it under all argonaut extensions, I guess :)

The new draft also just references http://argonaut.hl7.org
http://healthedatainc.com/go-ftp/Argo-DSTU2/structuredefinition-argo-condition.html
funny, last night I created a new code system -- http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-condition-category...
Sorry, this isn't great on our part -- will add an issue to Argonaut for us to discuss on next call.
Ok, this question came up in S4S since the validator is trying to check values coming back against the IG, and it's not really clear what this *should* be :)
I can add an issue if you haven't @Brett Marquard - just let me know
I added a new issue Proper Argonaut extension code system. For now, I believe everything should be http://argonaut.hl7.org/. Where on the page to you see the others?
We fixed the examples a week or two back. My open question is what goes into US-core -- it seems we should have a us-core-* for these items if required for CCDS.
It's on http://argonautwiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Argonaut_Condition_Category_Codes, which is linked from the conditions page
looks like that was missed -- on the extension code system page they were updated http://argonautwiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Argonaut_Extension_Codes
Updated to http://argonaut.hl7.org/ as the code system. I prefer to have it all one way going into our next call...
